Experiment Method.Assay Method: Cell viability assay (Fe2+ uptake and cell death measurement)

Material used.Description: SH-SY5Y cells stably expressing DMT1 (singly or with wild-type/mutant α-synuclein) were used.

Readout description.Molecular Effect: Enhanced Fe2+ uptake and cell death
Readout description.Result Description: Overexpression of DMT1 dramatically enhanced Fe2+ uptake, which promoted cell death. Autophagy inhibition reversed cell death.

Biological replicates.Description: Not explicitly described in the text.

Experiment Method.Assay Method: Oxidative stress and DNA damage measurement

Material used.Description: SH-SY5Y cells stably expressing DMT1 (singly or with wild-type/mutant α-synuclein) were used.

Readout description.Molecular Effect: Increased oxidative stress and DNA damage
Readout description.Result Description: Fe2+ uptake was associated with increased oxidative stress and DNA damage.
